member.name: F:Weasel.Core.AutoCreate.All
member.summary: Will drop and recreate tables that do not match the Marten configuration or create new ones

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.AutoCreate.CreateOrUpdate
member.summary: Will never destroy existing tables. Attempts to add missing columns or missing tables

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.AutoCreate.CreateOnly
member.summary: Will create missing schema objects at runtime, but will not update or remove existing schema objects

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.AutoCreate.None
member.summary: Do not recreate, destroy, or update schema objects at runtime. Will throw exceptions if the schema does not match the Marten configuration

member.summary: Really just the filename when the SQL is exported

member.name: T:Weasel.Core.Migrations.ReconnectionOptions
member.summary: Reconnection policy options when the database is unavailable while applying database changes.
member.param: The maximum number of reconnections if the database is unavailable while applying database changes. Default is 3.
The base delay between reconnections to perform if the database is unavailable while applying database changes. Note it'll be performed with exponential backoff. Default is 50ms.

member.name: M:Weasel.Core.Migrations.ReconnectionOptions.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reconnection policy options when the database is unavailable while applying database changes.
member.param: The maximum number of reconnections if the database is unavailable while applying database changes. Default is 3.
The base delay between reconnections to perform if the database is unavailable while applying database changes. Note it'll be performed with exponential backoff. Default is 50ms.

member.name: P:Weasel.Core.Migrations.ReconnectionOptions.MaxReconnectionCount
member.summary: The maximum number of reconnections if the database is unavailable while applying database changes. Default is 3.

member.name: P:Weasel.Core.Migrations.ReconnectionOptions.DelayInMs
member.summary: The base delay between reconnections to perform if the database is unavailable while applying database changes. Note it'll be performed with exponential backoff. Default is 50ms.

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.SchemaPatchDifference.None

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.SchemaPatchDifference.Create
member.summary: Configured schema objects are missing in the existing database structure

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.SchemaPatchDifference.Update
member.summary: There are detected differences between the expected configuration of a schema object and the existing database

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.SchemaPatchDifference.Invalid
member.summary: The existing database object in incompatible somehow with the expected configuration and Weasel cannot determine the update SQL to bridge the difference

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.SecurityRights.Invoker
member.summary: Upsert functions will execute with the rights of the current Postgresql user. This is the default in both Marten and Postgresql.

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.SecurityRights.Definer
member.summary: Upsert functions will execute with the rights of the Postgresql user that created the schema objects.

member.name: F:Weasel.Core.SqlFormatting.Concise
member.summary: Write object SQL in a terse format
